EmailTemplate.description: CSR initial response to customer informing request was received
EmailTemplate.name: D&S Quotes 1st response
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject} {!Case.CaseNumber} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We are working on your inquiry.
Your case number is: {!Case.CaseNumber}.
If you have any questions, please reply to this email.
Honeywell Customer Support http://www.MyAerospace.com
